meta.name: Digital Twin Implementation in Tunnel Monitoring
meta.desc: Decision about implementing a Digital Twin system for real-time tunnel monitoring and safety.

goal: Should the Digital Twin system be implemented for tunnel monitoring?

arguments.text: Implementing a Digital Twin system can improve real-time monitoring of tunnel safety conditions.
The initial investment cost for implementing the system is significantly higher than the current budget allocation.
The system will drastically improve worker safety and reduce the risk of accidents within the tunnel.
The data collection infrastructure (e.g., sensors, IoT devices) is not fully deployed, hindering the system's effectiveness.
Digital Twin technology could optimize maintenance schedules and reduce long-term operational costs for the tunnel.
